Title: Mr. Bean's Holiday
Writer: Rowan Atkinson (character), Richard Curtis (character), Simon McBurney (story), Hamish McColl (screenplay), Robin Driscoll (screenplay)
Actors: Rowan Atkinson, Steve Pemberton, Lily Atkinson, Preston Nyman
Plot: Mr. Bean wins a trip to Cannes where he unwittingly separates a young boy from his father and must help the two reunite. On the way he discovers France, bicycling, and true love.
Production: Working Title Films, Tiger Aspect Pictures, Universal Pictures
